name: Rename Common File to DLL File
description: Detects cases in which a file gets renamed to .dll, which often happens to bypass perimeter protection
query: (file.path:/.*\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/ AND (NOT ((OriginalFilename:(/.*\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/ OR /.*\.[Tt][Mm][Pp]/) OR OriginalFilename:(/.*\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]\..*/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Qq][Uu][Ii][Rr][Rr][Ee][Ll][Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp].*/)) OR (process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ss][Xx][Ss]\\.*/ AND process.executable:/.*\\[Tt][Ii][Ww][Oo][Rr][Kk][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(file.path:*.dll AND (NOT ((OriginalFilename:(*.dll OR *.tmp) OR OriginalFilename:(*.dll.* OR *\\SquirrelTemp\\temp*)) OR (process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\* AND process.executable:*\\TiWorker.exe))))`
